{{about|the command in Java Edition Classic|the current command to set a player's spawn|Commands/spawnpoint|the current command to set the world spawnpoint|Commands/setworldspawn}}
{{Outdated feature|edition=java}}
{{Infobox command
|name=setspawn
|oplevel=2
}}

Sets the current location as the default [[World Spawn|spawn]] location for new [[players]].

This is the [[Java Edition Classic]] equivalent of {{cmd|setworldspawn}}.

;Syntax

: <code>setspawn</code>
